item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

your post makes no sense whatsoever, read this again and again until you comprehend that this thread should be deleted:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:35, topic:293439”][quote author=L1nk3 link=topic=388301.msg2942819#msg2942819 date=1252012585]
Quick questions

Does this have the ability to load hooks? (Stupid question, but i am stupid :D)
[/quote]‘hooks’ are simple ‘getters’ injected into the client to get the value of a certain member during runtime by invoking the the respective function. it has nothing to do with the loading of the applet itself[/quote]
